meanings.def: a mental condition caused by severe shock, especially when the harmful effects last for a long time
examples: the effects of trauma and stress on the body
The children showed no signs of trauma after their ordeal.
patients who have histories of childhood trauma

meanings.def: an unpleasant experience that makes you feel upset and/or anxious
examples: She felt exhausted after the traumas of recent weeks.
It can take a long time to get over such a trauma.
We try to avoid putting children through the trauma of giving evidence.
The patient suffered severe brain trauma.
